description:
托福口语获得高分的条件有很多，大家需要发音标准、答题思维明确、词汇和句型的运用灵活等，尤其是词汇和句型方面，大家在平时的练习和复习过程中要多注意积累，只有在平时注意积累了考试才能灵活运用。本文汇总了托福口语常用句型。希望对你有所帮助~

托福口语常用句型汇总-抱怨类 托福口语常用句型汇总-购物类
托福口语中可以运用的词汇和句型，不仅要多样，更重要的是要地道。如果能够在托福口语中加入一些美国地道的俚语或者口语，肯定会令大家的托福口语答题有所提高和增色。一起看一些关于“抱怨类”的美国地道口语。 托福口语中可以运用的词汇和句型，不仅要多样，更重要的是要地道。如果能够在托福口语中加入一些美国地道的俚语或者口语，肯定会令大家的托福口语答题有所提高和增色。一起看一些关于“购物类”的美国地道口语。
托福口语常用句型汇总-问话类 托福口语常用短句大奉送
托福口语中可以运用的词汇和句型，不仅要多样，更重要的是要地道。如果能够在托福口语中加入一些美国地道的俚语或者口语，肯定会令大家的托福口语答题有所提高和增色。一起看一些关于“问话类”的美国地道口语。  大家在准备托福口语的时候，要准备一些常用的短语或者会话，只有在平时多多积累一些好的词句和用法，才能在考试的时候出色地发挥，本文为大家汇总了托福口语会用到的一些常用短句。
二十句托福口语常用短句 电影中的托福口语常用表达
在新托福口语考试中，一个重要的评分点就在于要灵活运用好的句型和可以为自己加分的句子，本文为大家总结整理的句子，希望大家要好好记住它们，在平时的练习、复习中不断积累和总结。  复习托福口语的重要的方法之一就是积累一些好的短语表达，大家要在平时的练习中灵活运用这些表达法，这样在考试中才能发挥出色，希望本文为大家做的积累和汇总对大家有所帮助。
托福口语常用词及例句 16句托福口语常用句子
托福口语考试中词汇和句型的运用是非常重要的，本文为大家例举了托福口语中常用的好的词汇和句子，希望对大家的备考有所帮助，大家要灵活运用这些词句，在考试中才能出色地发挥。  托福口语对我们考生来说有一定难度，大家也一直在寻找提高口语分数的方法，积累一些考试常用的句子是必不可少，本文就为大家总结了16句托福口语常用的句子，大家可以背记、熟读它们，希望对大家的备考有帮助。
5个托福口语常用固定表达 托福口语常用的25个名词总结
在托福口语考试中，大家经常会用到固定句型，复习期间，大家也会准备一些固定句型。本文为您总结了5个托福口语常用的固定句型和搭配，非常有用，希望会对大家的考试有所帮助。  托福口语中会用到大量的词汇，词汇的运用也是口语的评分标准之一，本文为大家整理在托福口语中经常会用到的25个名词，希望能帮助大家增加词汇量，提高托福口语的运用水平。
20个新托福口语常用比较句型 20个新托福口语常用否定句型
托福口语也考察大家口语句型的灵活运用，其中，比较句并不经常为大家所用。其实，有时候恰当地使用比较句型，说不准能达到出乎意料的效果，大家可以参考本文中的内容。 托福口语也考察大家口语句型的灵活运用，其中，否定句并不经常为大家所用。其实，有时候恰当地使用否定句型，说不准能达到出乎意料的效果，大家可以参考本文中的内容。
托福口语常用经典俚语A-G 托福口语常用经典俚语H-Z
 在托福口语考试过程中，经典俚语的运用会使考生的答案显得特别的亲切，也就会在同时让答案突出出来。那么，有哪些经典俚语是能够在托福口语考试中常用到的呢，本文为大家整理了一些，希望对大家有所帮助。   在托福口语考试过程中，经典俚语的运用会使考生的答案显得特别的亲切，也就会在同时让答案突出出来。那么，有哪些经典俚语是能够在托福口语考试中常用到的呢，本文为大家整理了一些，希望对大家有所帮助。 
14个新托福口语常用被动句型 新托福口语常用比较句型
在新托福口语考试中，被动句型的应用会得到意想不到的效果，省略主语的同时还突出了宾语和谓语。所以本文为大家例举了一些在口语中可以用的被动句型，大家可以熟悉一下，在口语中试着使用。 新托福口语考试中，比较句型是比较常用的句型，熟悉以下20个句型，托福口语比较句型不再成为难题。

title: 实用托福口语句型

description:
Celebrities flocked to Twitter and Instagram in their droves on Sunday as they celebrated their loved ones with sweet Mother's Day messages.星期天母亲节的时候，明星们都齐齐在推特和 Instagram 上表达对母亲祝福。

While some chose to post current photos with the women who brought them into the world, others- like Miley Cyrus - shared precious flashback shots from their childhood.一些明星选择上传一些母亲的近照，但又有一些明星，像麦莉塞勒斯，她就分享了一些她童年时候和母亲一起拍的珍贵合照。

'Happy Mother's Day mama @tishcyrus,' the 21-year-old captioned a happy snap in which she appears to be about seven or eight, huddled up close to her mom who's holding a fluffy white puppy.21岁的麦莉塞勒斯上传了一张她大概7，8岁时候拍的照片，照片中她紧紧地贴着她的妈妈，而她的妈妈还抱着一只毛绒绒的白色小狗。“母亲节快乐！”她写到。

Of course, the image is a far cry from the Miley we all know today, who takes every opportunity to flash the flesh and act lewdly whether on or off the stage.这张照片里的麦莉和现如今的她是千差万别，如今的她褪去了当初的青涩，无论在台上还是台下，她都喜欢裸露自己的身体，而且举止大胆。

Celebrating her first Mother's Day following the birth of daughter North last June, Kim Kardashian gushed that being a mom is 'the most rewarding feeling in the world'.金·卡戴珊今年迎来了自己的首个母亲节，她的孩子诺斯去年六月出生，她表示当妈妈是世界上最令人有成就感的事。

Taking to Instagram, she shared a stunning black and white photo from the previous day - her bridal shower - lying on a white fur rug in her matching dress as her little one, who is also dressed in a sweet white romper, crawls over her for a kiss.她把一张黑白照片上传到Instagram，那张照片记录了当时她新娘送礼会的时候。卡戴珊当时身穿一件白色婚裙，抱着她的宝贝躺在白色的毛皮毯上。她的孩子身穿一条连体裤，趴在妈妈身上准备来一个爱的亲亲。

'This little girl has changed my world in more ways than I ever could have imagined! Being a mom is the most rewarding feeling in the world! Happy Mothers Day to all of the moms out there!' the 33-year-old wrote.33岁的她写到：“这个小姑娘在许多方面改变了我的生活，这完全超出了我的想象。做当妈妈是世界上最有成就感的事情，祝所有的妈妈母亲节快乐！”

'To the woman who taught me everything I know about being a mom... Happy Mother's Day mom!' Britney Spears captioned a snap of her with mom Lynne Spears.小甜甜布兰妮也上传了一张她与母亲林恩·斯皮尔斯的合照并写到：“祝一直教导我的妈妈，母亲节快乐！”

Madonna's oldest son, Rocco Ritchie, gushed that mom Madonna is the 'greatest mother ever' , which she reposted with the comment: 'One Lucky Mother!! #livingforlove.'麦当娜的大儿子，洛可·里奇，也表示自己的妈妈麦当娜是世界上最好的妈妈。麦当娜回复说：“我是一个幸运的母亲。”

title: 明星齐祝妈妈母亲节快乐

description:
沪江英乐：创作才女 Sara Bareilles 新单《I Choose You》！Sara 帮助 Matt 和 Aly 两位粉丝，完成了他/她们向各自爱人的求婚。Matt 用便利贴为女友搭建出别墅，森林，甚至南极冰山；Aly 则手绘出一幅幅温馨有趣的插画，只为让她的女友感受到她的坚定。Sara的出现，更是整场求婚的沸点！

【Sara Bareilles 浪漫新单《I Choose You》】

歌词：

Let the bough break, let it come down crashing
Let the sun fade out to a dark sky
I can't say I'd even notice it was absent
Cause I could live by the light in your eyes

I'll unfold before you
What I've strung together
The very first words
Of a lifelong love letter

Tell the world that we finally got it all right
I choose you
I will become yours and you will become mine
I choose you
I choose you
(Yeah)

There was a time when I would have believed them
If they told me that you could not come true
Just love's illusion
But then you found me and everything changed
And I believe in something again

My whole heart
Will be yours forever
This is a beautiful start
To a lifelong love letter

Tell the world that we finally got it all right
I choose you
I will become yours and you will become mine
I choose you
I choose you

We are not perfect
We'll learn from our mistakes
And as long as it takes
I will prove my love to you

I am not scared of the elements
I am underprepared, but I am willing
And even better
I get to be the other half of you

Tell the world that we finally got it all right
I choose you
I will become yours and you will become mine
I choose you
I choose you

description:
She plays a mutant who can change shape to look like any person in X-Men: Days Of Future Past.珍妮佛·劳伦斯在《X战警：逆转未来》中扮演“魔形女”，她可以任意变成其他人的样子。

But Jennifer Lawrence proved that the most impressive form she can assume is her own on Saturday as she arrived in a backless midnight blue gown to the premiere of the Marvel Comics film in New York.在星期六纽约，珍妮佛·劳伦斯以一身露背深蓝色吊带长裙出席《X战警》首映式，看来无论“魔形女”变成什么样子，最令人印象深刻的还是她自己本来的面貌。

The 23-year-old was dreamy as she showed off her incredible figure in the form-hugging dark coloured dress.一条深色长裙勾勒出23岁的珍妮弗美好的身段，她实在是美丽极了。

Showing off the backless design of her gown, Jennifer struck a series of sultry poses that displayed her lean and toned back muscles.珍妮弗身穿露背长裙，大方秀出自己美丽的背部曲线，还摆了很多性感撩人的姿势。

Also at the premiere was Hugh Jackman (Wolverine) and Ellen Page (Kitty Pryde).休·杰克曼（饰演金刚狼）和艾伦·佩姬（饰演幻影猫）都出席了当天的首映式。

Meanwhile, Jackman's Wolverine plays a pivotal role in the film, straddling two timelines when he is asked by the older Professor X (Stewart) to return to the past to persuade his younger self (James McAvoy) to change the past and therefore save the mutants of the future.杰克曼在剧中扮演的金刚狼，是电影中的重要角色。这次的电影剧情沿着两条时间线进行，X教授（帕特里克·斯图尔特饰演）请求金刚狼回到过去去说服过去的自己（詹姆斯·麦卡沃伊饰演），这样才能改变历史，拯救未来变种人的命运。

This means teaming up with his old friend and enemy Magneto (McKellen) whose younger self is again played by Fassbender.这意味着金刚狼需要和自己的老朋友还有敌人万磁王（伊恩·麦克莱恩饰演）合作。迈克尔·法斯宾德将再一次饰演万磁王年轻时的角色。

A threat is posed by military scientist Bolivar Trask (Peter Dinklage) whose company has created a range of robots called Sentinels whose purpose is to hunt and destroy mutants.这一次变种人的威胁来自于军事科学家玻利瓦尔·特拉斯克（彼特·丁拉基饰演），他的公司创造出了一种新型特种战斗机器人：“哨兵”。创造这些机器人的目的是去猎杀彻底毁灭变种人。

The film sees the return of many of the X-Men cast members from the original three film franchise including Halle Berry as Storm, Ellen Page as Kitty Pryde and Anna Paquin's Rogue.这次的《X战警》将会迎来前三部主演悉数回归：哈莉·贝瑞（暴风女），艾伦·佩姬（幻影猫），安娜·帕奎因（小淘气）。

It follows on from the hit 2011 film X-Men: First Class set in 1962 and set as a prequel to the trilogy.这部延续了2011年《X战警：第一战》中1962年的剧情，这算是X战警三部曲的前传。

description:
沪江英乐：英伦吉他才子 Ed Sheeran 最新动人单曲《All Of The Stars》！在从容的钢琴声中，Ed Sheeran 清澈的声音唱着最简单的爱情，镜头扫过卧室贴满来自粉丝的艺术字体创作，这些温馨的字句大部分来自约翰·格林的小说《无比美妙的痛苦》。

【Ed Sheeran 最新动人单曲《All Of The Stars》】

歌词：

It's just another night
And I'm staring at the moon
I saw a shooting star
And thought of you
I sang a lullaby
By the waterside and knew
If you were here,
I'd sing to you
You're on the other side
As the skyline splits in two
I'm miles away from seeing you
I can see the stars
From America
I wonder, do you see them, too?

So open your eyes and see
The way our horizons meet
And all of the lights will lead
Into the night with me
And I know these scars will bleed
As both of our hearts bleed
All of these stars will guide us home

I can hear your heart
On the radio beat
They're playing 'Chasing Cars'
And I thought of us
Back to the time,
You were lying next to me
I looked across and fell in love
So I took your hand
Back through Londons streets I knew
Everything led back to you
So can you see the stars?
Over Amsterdam
You're the song my heart is
Beating to

So open your eyes and see
The way our horizons meet
And all of the lights will lead
Into the night with me
And I know these scars will bleed
But both of our hearts bleed
All of these stars will guide us home

And, oh, I know
And oh, I know, oh
I can see the stars
From America
